sentences.en: "How come we never know what's going on?" he groused.
sentences.cn: “我们怎么会不知道发生了什么事？”他抱怨道。

sentences.en: Grouse will soon be in season again.
sentences.cn: 允许捕猎松鸡的时期又快到了.

sentences.en: He got up at four and set out on foot to hunt black grouse.
sentences.cn: 他4点钟起了床，徒步出发去猎杀黑琴鸡。

sentences.en: He is a member of a grouse shoot.
sentences.cn: 他是一名狩猎松鸡的队员.

sentences.en: He shot a woodchuck and a grouse, and on the tenth day he shot a moose.
sentences.cn: 他打了一只山鼠和一只松鸡, 第十天还打了一头麋.

sentences.en: If you don't agree with me, please forget my grouse.
sentences.cn: 如果你的看法不同, 请不必介意我的牢骚之言.

sentences.en: North American grouse that feeds on evergreen buds and needles.
sentences.cn: 以常绿植物的嫩芽和针叶为食的北美松鸡.

sentences.en: Old Charlie would find something new to grouse about each day.
sentences.cn: 老查理每天总会找到新的抱怨的对象.

sentences.en: Still have the aunt next door, father calls her grouse.
sentences.cn: 还有隔壁的阿姨, 爸爸叫她野鸡.

sentences.en: The manager is tired of listening to the guest's grouse.
sentences.cn: 经理对于听客人的抱怨已经厌倦了.

sentences.en: The party had been to the grouse moors that morning.
sentences.cn: 这群人那天上午去了松鸡猎场。

sentences.en: They kept people off their grouse moors.
sentences.cn: 他们不让人们接近他们的松鸡猎场.

sentences.en: They're shooting grouse up on the moors.
Yet subtract the grouse and the whole thing is dead.
sentences.cn: 但是若从系统里拿走松鸡,整个系统也停转了.

trans.tran_cn: 松鸡，雷鸟科的猎鸟，松鸡肉，委屈，牢骚话，爱发牢骚的人
trans.tran_en: a small bird that is hunted and shot for food and sport, or the flesh of this bird
